package_description: The EUROPE SPL Tour package is a 15-day journey through Europe's most iconic destinations. Visit Paris, Brussels, Amsterdam, Stuttgart, Zurich, Venice, Pisa, Florence, and Rome. Explore historical landmarks, cultural sites, and scenic beauty, including the Eiffel Tower, Disneyland, Rhine Falls, and the Colosseum.

itinerary.title: Flight to Paris and City Tour
Overnight Stay at Brussels
activities: 01:00pm - View of Atomium, Mini Europe with lunch
07:00pm - Check-in to hotel with packed dinner

itinerary.title: Overnight Stay at Amsterdam
activities: 04:00pm - Amsterdam canal cruise and free time for shopping

itinerary.title: Overnight Stay at Venice
activities: 03:00pm - Half-day walking tour in Venice Island – Saint Mark’s Basilica, St. Mark’s Square, Bridge of Sighs
05:00pm - Gondola boat ride (25 mins, 5 persons in each gondola)
08:00pm - Check into hotel with packed dinner

itinerary.title: Overnight Stay at Rome
activities: 09:00am - Hotel check-out and visit Leaning Tower of Pisa

itinerary.title: Overnight Stay at Rome
activities: 10:00am to 01:00pm - Vatican tour with admission to Vatican Museum

itinerary.title: Overnight Stay at Rome
activities: 01:30pm to 05:30pm - Free time for shopping at Porta di Roma Galleria Commerciale
07:00pm - Drop at hotel with packed dinner

package_includes: Lunch: Indian Restaurant/ Packed Indian lunches veg/non-veg menu as per itinerary
Dinner: Indian restaurants with standard menu veg/non-veg menu
Entrance fees as mentioned in the Itinerary
Sightseeing as mentioned in the itinerary
package_excludes: Tips to driver (4€ per day per person)
Optional tours other than mentioned in the Itinerary
Any meals/drinks other than mentioned in the Itinerary
title: Charming European Cities

package_description: Embark on a divine journey with the Chardham Special Package, visiting the most sacred temples in India. From the spiritual vibrancy of Delhi and Haridwar to the high-altitude temples of Kedarnath and Badrinath, this package offers a deep, enriching experience of India’s spiritual heritage. Explore the holy shrines, partake in sacred ceremonies, and enjoy the serenity of the Himalayas while traveling in comfort. A perfect pilgrimage for those seeking spiritual enlightenment and adventure.

itinerary.title: Arrival Delhi – Akshardham
activities: Pickup from Delhi Airport / Railway Station.
Check in to Hotel (Check-in time as per Hotel Policy).

itinerary.title: Visit Delhi Local – Haridwar Journey
activities: 8:00 am to 1:00 pm: Visit Delhi local sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Visit Haridwar Local
activities: 8:00 am to 2:00 pm: Visit Manasa Devi Temple and Chandi Devi Temple.
5:00 pm to 7:00 pm: Visit Ganga Harathi.

itinerary.title: Haridwar – Ranachatti Journey
activities: 6:30 am: Breakfast and journey to Ranachatti.
6:00 pm: Arrival at Ranachatti and rest.

itinerary.title: Yamunothri Temple Darshan
activities: 8:00 am to 4:00 pm: Visit Yamunothri Temple Darshan (by walk, doli, or horse).

itinerary.title: Uttarkashi Journey – Visit Uttarkashi Temple
activities: 4:00 pm to 6:00 pm: Visit Uttarkashi (Kashi Viswanath) temple.

itinerary.title: Gangothri Temple Visit
activities: 9:00 am to 12:00 pm: Holy bath and visit Gangothri temple.

itinerary.title: Kedarnath Temple Visit
activities: 6:00 am to 7:00 pm: Full day visit Kedarnath temple.

itinerary.title: Optional Day for Kedarnath Visit
activities: 6:00 am to 7:00 pm: Optional full day visit Kedarnath temple.

itinerary.title: Badrinath Temple Visit
activities: 9:00 am to 1:00 pm: Visit Badrinath temple and perform pooja at Brahmakapalam.
4:00 pm to 6:00 pm: Visit Mana Village by local vehicle.

itinerary.title: Visit Rishikesh Local – Haridwar Journey
activities: 6:00 pm to 8:00 pm: Visit Rishikesh local sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Return Journey
activities: 8:00 am: Breakfast and check-out from the hotel.
After lunch, drop at Delhi Airport / Railway Station.

package_excludes: Small vehicle charges in boat no-entry areas.
title: Sacred Spiritual Journey

package_description: The Kerala Special Package is a delightful journey through some of Kerala’s most iconic locations, offering a perfect mix of temples, natural beauty, and cultural experiences. From the serene Guruvayur Temple to the pristine beaches of Kovalam and the tranquil backwaters of Alleppey, this package has something for everyone.

itinerary.title: Arrival Cochin - Visit Guruvayur Temple
activities: 5:00 pm to 8:00 pm: Visit Guruvayur Temple.

itinerary.title: Visit Athirampally Waterfalls - Travel to Munnar
activities: 10:00 am to 12:00 pm: Visit Athirampally Waterfalls.
6:30 pm: Arrival in Munnar and rest.

itinerary.title: Munnar Local Sightseeing
activities: 9:00 am to 5:00 pm: Munnar local sightseeing - Flower Garden, Photo Point, Honey Bee Tree, Echo Point, Shooting Point, Madupatty Dam, Tea Museum.

itinerary.title: Munnar to Thekkady
activities: 8:00 am: Breakfast and journey to Thekkady.
11:00 am to 1:00 pm: Visit Spice Garden and Elephant Park.
2:00 pm to 5:00 pm: Wildlife boat ride at Thekkady.
Evening: Kalari Fight Show and Cultural Dance Show.

itinerary.title: Thekkady - Kovalam - Trivandrum
activities: 7:00 am: Breakfast and journey to Trivandrum.
4:00 pm to 6:00 pm: Visit Kovalam Beach.

itinerary.title: Trivandrum - Varkala - Alleppey - Cochin
activities: 4:00 am to 7:00 am: Visit Trivandrum Temple.
7:30 am: Breakfast and journey to Varkala Beach.
10:00 am to 11:00 am: Visit Varkala Beach.
4:00 pm to 5:00 pm: Alleppey sightseeing by boat.

itinerary.title: Cochin Local Sightseeing - Return Journey
activities: 9:00 am to 11:00 am: Visit Chotanikker Amman Temple.
2:00 pm to 4:00 pm: Visit Marine Drive.
Drop at Cochin Airport/Railway Station for return journey.

package_includes: AC Vehicle for transportation (Except Hill Stations).
title: God's Own Country
